entry.title: Awesome Javascript Updates on Dec 13, 2022
entry.content:
Web Worker / Runner

  • partytown (‚≠ê13k) - Relocate resource intensive third-party scripts off of the main thread and into a web worker.
  • comlink (‚≠ê12k) - Comlink is a tiny library (1.1kB), that removes the mental barrier of thinking about postMessage and hides the fact that you are working with workers.
  • greenlet (‚≠ê4.7k) - Move an async function into its own thread.
  • workerize (‚≠ê4.4k) - Moves a module into a Web Worker, automatically reflecting exported functions as asynchronous proxies.
  • worker-dom (‚≠ê3.2k) - An in-progress implementation of the DOM API intended to run within a Web Worker.
  • threads.js (‚≠ê3.5k) - Offload CPU-intensive tasks to worker threads in node.js, web browsers and electron using one uniform API.
  • workly (‚≠ê1.9k) - A really simple way to move a function or class to a web worker.
  • stockroom (‚≠ê1.8k) - Offload your store management to a worker easily.
  • workerpool (‚≠ê2.2k) - Offload tasks to a pool of workers on node.js and in the browser.
  • clooney (‚≠ê1.4k) - Clooney is an actor library for the web. Use workers without thinking about workers.

  • visjs - Multiple Libraries for dynamic, browser-based data visualization.
  • Cytoscape.js (‚≠ê11k) - A fully featured graph theory library.
  • cola.js - library for arranging your HTML5 documents and diagrams using constraint-based optimization techniques
  • jointjs (‚≠ê5k) - Diagramming library to create static diagrams or fully interactive diagramming tools.

Data Structure / Runner

  • ngraph.graph (‚≠ê557) - Graph data structure in javascript.

Storage / Runner

  • pouchdb (‚≠ê17k) - Javascript db inspired by Apache CouchDB to run well within the browser.

  • Hoodie (‚≠ê4.4k) - Offline First backend to work in browser without internet connectivity.

Operating System / Runner

Form Widgets / Other

Modals and Popups / Other

  • SweetAlert2 (‚≠ê18k) - An awesome replacement for JavaScript's alert.

Scroll / Other

  • asscroll (‚≠ê939) - A hybrid smooth scroll setup that combines the performance gains of virtual scroll with the reliability of native scroll.
  • stroll (‚≠ê4.4k) - A collection of CSS List scroll effects bind to dom through javascript.
  • locomotive-scroll (‚≠ê8.4k) - Detects the elements in viewport and smooth scrolling with parallax.

Images / Other

  • Drift (‚≠ê1.6k) - Easily add "zoom on hover" functionality to your site's images. Lightweight, no-dependency JavaScript.

Maps / Other

Video/Audio / Other

  • ractive-player (‚≠ê793) - A library for making interactive videos in React.js.
  • ffmpeg.js (‚≠ê3.4k) - FFmpeg optimized for in-browser use: minimal size for faster loading, asm.js, performance tunings, etc.
  • flv.js (‚≠ê23k) - An HTML5 Flash Video (FLV) Player written in pure JavaScript without Flash.
  • hls.js (‚≠ê16k) - A JavaScript library that implements an HTTP Live Streaming client. It relies on HTML5 video and MediaSource Extensions for playback.

Animations / Other

  • shuffle-images (‚≠ê213) - The Simplest Way to shuffle through images in a Creative Way.

SDK / Other

Full Text Search / Other

  • lunr (‚≠ê9.1k) - Library for use in the browser and It indexes JSON documents and provides a simple search interface for retrieving documents that best match text queries.

  • YUIDoc is a Node.js application that generates API documentation from comments in source, using a syntax similar to tools like Javadoc and Doxygen.
  • coddoc is a jsdoc parsing library. Coddoc is different in that it is easily extensible by allowing users to add tag and code parsers through the use of coddoc.addTagHandler and coddoc.addCodeHandler. coddoc also parses source code to be used in APIs.
